name: PIR Proximity Wardrobe Sensor - Merrytek
metaTitle: Merrytek PIR Proximity Sensor for Wardrobes | Onco Solutions
metaDescription: A smart, hands-free lighting solution for wardrobes and cabinets. The Merrytek PIR proximity sensor offers convenient, energy-saving illumination.
shortDescription: Discover a smarter way to light your wardrobes, cabinets, and closets with the Merrytek PIR Proximity Wardrobe Sensor. Designed with precision and convenience in mind, this sensor offers effortless, hands-free illumination the moment you reach for your belongings â€” and powers down automatically to save energy when no longer needed.
description_points: Motion-Activated: Lights turn on automatically when you open your wardrobe.
Energy Efficient: Lights switch off after a set time without movement.
Easy Installation: Compact and discreet design fits neatly inside wardrobes, cabinets, and closets.
Smart Sensitivity: Advanced PIR technology ensures accurate motion detection with minimal false triggers.
Customizable Timing: Set delay times according to your preference.
